altername_name: クィーン オブ デュエリスト外伝α
name: The Queen of Duellist Gaiden Alpha
overview: The Queen of Duellist Gaiden α allows the players to select any of the fighters from either The Queen of Duellist or The Queen of Duellist Gaiden. These include characters that were not initially playable in the corresponding games: Ryuhou from the first one, and the antagonists Gold and Takegami from the second. In total, ten characters are available: Miyuki, Emily, Ryuhou (first game), Chizuru, Reika, Kiriko, Mei, Elza, Gold, and Takegami (second game).
